name: Dead Sea

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: The{cutting}"great" republic couldn't find enough soliders to liberate this camp, so they sent{emph}you? Pathetic.

topics.topic_text: What's the situation here?
topics.response_text: {disciplined}My orders are to hold Nelson. So far the enemy north of here has been too frightened to move against us. Why should it concern you?

topics.topic_text: I was in the area, that's all.
topics.response_text: Not all of us have the luxury of coming and going as we please. Here, we stay put.{slightly snide}

topics.topic_text: How can I help break the stalemate?
topics.response_text: {irked}What stalemate? It is Caesar's will that I hold this position - that I{emph}not advance.

topics.topic_text: I'll be on my way.
topics.response_text: You have license to go where you please, at my will.{dismissed}True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: Why haven't you attacked the enemy?
topics.response_text: I{stress}have attacked the enemy. I led the assault on Nelson with two contubernia against twice our number.{offended}

topics.topic_text: You're demoralizing the enemy by leaving them alone?
topics.response_text: I do not question Caesar's will! I do not second-guess!{angry}

topics.topic_text: Sounds like fun. I'll be right back.
topics.response_text: {doubting the player will attack the enemy, and if so, that he will survive}That remains to be seen.

topics.topic_text: No offense intended. Carry on.
topics.response_text: You are not my Centurion! You aren't even Legion! I do not "carry on" at your command.{offended by presumption of authority}

topics.topic_text: I'll be on my way.
topics.response_text: True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: I'm going to kill everyone at Camp Forlorn Hope.
topics.response_text: A vow without action is breath across the lips, nothing more. True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: I've slaughtered the enemy at Camp Forlorn Hope.
topics.response_text: A glorious victory. You must be very{gritting your teeth}satisfied.{begrudging the player's success - you wish the glory was yours}

topics.topic_text: Nothing new to report, actually.
topics.response_text: Then there's nothing for us to talk about.{dismissed}True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: I'll carry your blade with honor.
topics.response_text: {What's done is done}True to{KAI-zar}Caesar.{Humiliated by the player's triumph, you give up your cherished blade to your rival to force yourself to distinguish yourself later.}

topics.topic_text: Why would I want a piece of shit machete?
topics.response_text: That blade has split the heads of...{collecting yourself}The only reason I give it to you is to force myself to earn another. True to Caesar.{Voice trembling with rage}

topics.topic_text: You earned your blade. Keep it.
topics.response_text: You don't understand. I'll have to distinguish myself in battle to earn another.{irritated}True to Caesar.

topics.topic_text: Who are you?
topics.response_text: I am a loyal servant of Caesar, and I thank my good fortune for the day that he plucked me as a babe from the shore of the Great Salt Lake.

topics.topic_text: What are you going to do about it?
topics.response_text: I'll execute Caesar's will by hurling your corpse into the Colorado - like the other Profligates before you!

topics.topic_text: Who are you?
topics.response_text: I am Dead Sea, Decanus of the Legion by the grace of Caesar, not that{emph}you're in any position to ask questions.

topics.topic_text: Let's see who's pathetic.
topics.response_text: {menacing}True to Caesar.

description:
Dead Sea is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

A dedicated and battle-hardened decanus of Caesar's Legion, Dead Sea is a warrior who has never known a life outside the Legion. Taken from his former tribe near the Great Salt Lake as a child, he was indoctrinated into Caesar's doctrine, becoming an obedient and loyal soldier. His name, reminiscent of the salt lake, reflects his origins and the harsh environment that shaped him.

Dead Sea's Personality: Dead Sea is fiercely devoted to Caesar and the Legion's ideology. While he follows orders without question, he personally craves glory in battle above all else. Despite his dedication, he possesses a rare ability to recognize another warrior's triumph and will even offer his own weapon as reward, using the humiliation of being surpassed as motivation to pursue greater accolades and forge a new blade in honor of his defeat.

Dead Sea's Backstory: Born to a tribe near the Great Salt Lake, Dead Sea was taken by Caesar's Legion as a young boy. From an early age, he was subjected to the Legion's brutal training and indoctrination, learning to value strength, loyalty, and conquest above all else. His unwavering devotion to Caesar earned him recognition, and by 2276, he had risen to the rank of decanus. In 2281, he was stationed at Nelson as base commander alongside fellow decanus Alexus, tasked with harassing NCR forces at nearby Camp Forlorn Hope.
